text: Thomas W. Sneddon Jr. (May 26, 1941 - November 1, 2014) was the district attorney of Santa Barbara County, California. He was best known for prosecuting charges of child molestation against pop singer Michael Jackson in 2005.http://select.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F10D10FB39590C728CDDAA0894DD404482 He retired in 2007.https://www.washingtonpost.com/wp- dyn/content/article/2005/06/14/AR2005061401676.html Jackson wrote a song about Sneddon called "D.S.". It was on his 1995 album HIStory: Past, Present and Future, Book I. The song was in response to Sneddon's investigation into Jackson for child molestation in 1993. Sneddon died on November 1, 2014 from complications of cancer, aged 73, at Santa Barbara Cottage Hospital, Santa Barbara, California, U.S. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in California Category:District attorneys Category:Lawyers from California Category:People from Santa Barbara, California
title: Thomas W. Sneddon Jr.
